8.verification_summary: For a normal distribution with mean mu and standard deviation sigma, P prime over P equals negative (x minus mu) divided by sigma squared, so entropic force gamma times P prime over P equals negative gamma times (x minus mu) divided by sigma squared, i.e. a linear spring with spring constant gamma over sigma squared.
